name: INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING - NON UK CUSTOMERS ADD THIS TO CART
description: Add to cart if you are purchasing from outwith the Uk as the website doesn't take account of international shipping.

categories.name: International Shipping Charge for non UK customers

name: Dazzling Ombre Bottle Green Array
description:
A gorgeous lime base with an elegant swirl pattern. Perfect to wear as a hijab, neck scarf or even as a dupatta for your kurta!

A maxi hijab is simply an oversized hijab- that is, longer than the standard sized hijabs on the market.

Size: 110cm Width x 180cm Length (approx)

The material of our hijabs are viscose, polyester or a mix of both. They are soft and easy to wrap and style!

We try to upload photos that are a true reflection of the products available, however lighting and monitor screen settings on your device may cause a slight colour difference.

We request that International customers please add International shipping to your cart as the store only charges UK shipping. The link can be found in the categories tab

name: Maroon and white/nude ombré maxi hijab
description:
A maxi hijab is simply an oversized hijab- that is, longer than the standard sized hijabs on the market.

Size: 110cm Width x 180cm Length (approx)

The material of our ombres are 100% soft viscose and they are a little lighter than the normal plain hijabs; they are soft and easy to wrap and style!
